alert.note: Alert for Lower Tangipahoa; Southeast St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 2:30PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Patchy Dense fog formation possible... Fog formation is possible tonight into tomorrow morning. Several variables come into play. This SPS is put in place for cautionary reasons. Condtions are not greatly favorable for formation tonight, but can`t be ruled out. Fireworks activity may push the possibility of formation into the probability of fog formation in the late evening hours. Then, in the early morning hours through just after daybreak, especially near bodies of water. Again, these conditions are not likely for fog formation, but the possibility is there and worth mentioning. Use additional care if you do encounter fog while driving,

area.areaDesc: Lower Tangipahoa; Southeast St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany
